SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Factories.Interfaces

Interface ComponentsFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComponentsImplement
public interface ComponentsFactory
ComponentsFactory interface defines methods for creating various UI components and game elements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

      Returns:

    • createHealthBar

      javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle createHealthBar(double width, double height, javafx.scene.paint.Color fill)
      Creates a new health bar rectangle with the specified width, height, and fill color.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the health bar.
      height - The height of the health bar.
      fill - The fill color of the health bar.
      Returns:
      A new Rectangle representing the health bar.

    • createHealthBarBackground

      javafx.scene.text.Text createBossNameText(String name, javafx.scene.text.Font font, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Creates a new Text object for displaying the boss's name with the specified font and color.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the boss.
      font - The font to be applied to the text.
      color - The color of the text.
      Returns:
      A new Text object representing the boss's name.

      Creates a new Shield icon with the specified position and size.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - The x-coordinate of the shield icon.
      yPosition - The y-coordinate of the shield icon.
      size - The size of the shield icon.
      Returns:
      A new Shield object representing the shield icon.

      yPosition - The y-coordinate of the heart display.
      heartsToDisplay - The number of hearts to display.

    • createLevelView

      LevelScreen createLevelView(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, double screenWidth, javafx.scene.Group uiLayer)
      Creates a new LevelScreen with the specified root group, number of hearts to display, screen width, and UI layer.
      Parameters:
      root - The root group where the level screen elements will be added.
      heartsToDisplay - The number of hearts to display.
      screenWidth - The width of the screen.
      uiLayer - The group representing the UI layer.
      Returns:
      A new LevelScreen object.

    • createMainMenu

      MainMenu createMainMenu(Controller controller)
      Creates a new MainMenu with the specified controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller responsible for managing game flow.
      Returns:
      A new MainMenu object.

    • createPauseScreen

      PauseScreen createPauseScreen(javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.scene.Scene scene, LevelParent levelParent, Controller controller)
      Creates a new PauseScreen with the specified root group, scene, level parent, and controller.
      Parameters:
      root - The root group where the pause screen elements will be added.
      scene - The scene where the pause screen will be displayed.
      levelParent - The parent level object.
      controller - The controller responsible for managing game flow.
      Returns:
      A new PauseScreen object.

      max - The maximum value of the slider.

    • createMainSettingsLayout

      javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane createMainSettingsLayout(javafx.scene.layout.HBox titleBox, javafx.scene.layout.VBox soundSettingsPane, javafx.scene.layout.HBox backButtonBox)
      Creates a new BorderPane layout for the main settings screen with the specified title box, sound settings pane, and back button box.
      Parameters:
      titleBox - The title box to be placed at the top of the layout.
      soundSettingsPane - The sound settings pane to be placed in the center of the layout.
      backButtonBox - The back button box to be placed at the bottom of the layout.
      Returns:
      A new BorderPane layout.

    • createSoundSettingsLayout

      javafx.scene.layout.VBox createSoundSettingsLayout(javafx.scene.layout.VBox soundEffectsBox, javafx.scene.layout.VBox backgroundMusicBox, javafx.scene.control.Button resetToDefaultButton)
      Creates a new VBox layout for the sound settings screen with the specified sound effects box, background music box, and reset to default button.
      Parameters:
      soundEffectsBox - The sound effects box to be included in the layout.
      backgroundMusicBox - The background music box to be included in the layout.
      resetToDefaultButton - The reset to default button to be included in the layout.
      Returns:
      A new VBox layout.

      Parameters:
      slider - The slider to be included in the layout.
      toggleButton - The toggle button to be included in the layout.
      Returns:
      A new HBox layout.
